name: CreateEventTicketType
description:
Create a new ticket type for an event.

Use this tool to create a new ticket type for an event. Call this when you need to specify different ticket categories for an event.

parameters.name: ticket_type_details
parameters.description: A JSON object containing the details of the ticket type, including name, price, and availability.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Luma API.
